EmailTemplate.description: Audit - Return to Study Reminder (Future Date)
EmailTemplate.name: Audit - Return to Study Reminder (Future Date)
EmailTemplate.subject: Audit - Return to Study Reminder (Future Date) - {!Contact.Name} {!Contact.Person_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Student,
An audit of student records revealed that you are due to return to study shortly following a period of [variation type].
Please be reminded that you are required to complete a Return from Leave/Study Away form via the online Graduate Research Services system which you can access at https://gradresearchforms.apps.monash.edu/.
It is important that your student record is adjusted to accurately reflect your status upon your return.
If you have any concerns or wish to discuss this matter further, you are most welcome to contact us on (03) 9905 3050.
Kind regards,
{!User.FirstName}
Graduate Research Services _____________________________________________ Monash Graduate Education Chancellery Building D, 26 Sports Walk Monash University, VIC 3800, Australia Phone: +61 3 990 53009 | Fax: +61 3 990 55042 Email: mge-candidature@monash.edu Website: monash.edu/graduate-research Campus Map: monash.edu/campuses/clayton/ CRICOS Provider No. 00008C
We're listeningâ€¦.your feedback helps us improve
Follow us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/MonashGraduateEducation
